ygData.subject: Re: LVL10
ygData.msgSnippet: I m 14th right now, and the other people I m with are 9-11th. Unrest was a waste because of the overcrowding of mega-level characters, and the really big bad
ygData.messageBody:
I'm 14th right now, and the other people I'm with are 9-11th. Unrest was a
waste because of the overcrowding of mega-level characters, and the really
big bad assed things that would come along, totally resist all my spells as
my comrades were running for the exit and I did the shadowstep/gate dance.

Crushbone seems to be right up my alley. I'm in Kaladim right now, how do I
get there?

Thanks


Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro

Oh, if I was you, I know a great place to power level, but it's Kerra Isle
between Queynos and Erudin. Just sit by the shipwreck and take on the zombie
sailors. I rocketed through 11-13 with them. However, you'll need to flesh
out your group some to do this, because the initial wave is 3. If you delay
looting corpses you can then take them on 1 at a time or 2 at a time. The
place also spawns 3 wisps, and because you can lap the island in under 2
minutes, they're readily found. Good cash, and great xps at 10-11th level.
As well, not a lot of people go there. Well, that's my experience.
-----Original Message-----
From: Jan Sterken <jsterken@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: 22 avril, 1999 16:39
Subject: [eq_wizards] LVL10


>From: "Jan Sterken" <jsterken@...>
>
>Hi,
>
>I play a High Elf Wizard. He is currently 10th lvl. The first 9 levels went
>very quickly. I was one of the first Wizards in my area and on my servers
to
>get to 9th. Now I am finding it very difficult to get past lvl 10. I seem
to
>die every time I am on whether grouped or solo. I almost never can get my
>gate spell off in time to get out of trouble. I do not want to resort to
>Kill Stealing (this is very easy for a wizard)
>
>Does anyone have advice on how to advance faster. And combinations of
spells
>to use when solo or in a group. I know there are not many options but I am
>hoping I have missed something and someone can help.
>
>I mostly adventure right now with a friend (11th level ranger) in
Crushbone.
>He seems to be sucking up most of the experience.(even when we were at the
>same level. The rest of the time I either solo or group (30% each)
>
>Help
>
>Havil,
>High Elf Wizard of the 10th Circle
>Servant of Mithaniel Marr
>Bristlebane
>
>
